mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user( nick_name, portrait, sex, openid, real_name, phone_no, city_id, id_card, create_date ) SELECT #{nickName}, #{portrait}, #{sex}, #{openid}, #{realName}, #{phoneNo}, #{cityId}, #{idCard}, now() FROM dual WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT id FROM t_user WHERE `openid` = #{openid})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_user set real_name=#{realName}, id_card=#{idCard}, city_id=#{cityId}, nick_name=#{nickName}, phone_no=#{phoneNo}, portrait=#{portrait}, sex=#{sex}, update_date = now() WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) from t_bills where userId = #{userId} ) as totalBillsNums, (SELECT SUM(t.num) from (SELECT COUNT(1) as num from t_bills where userId = #{userId} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(createDate, '%Y%m%d')) t) as totalKeepAccountsDays, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(money),0) from t_bills where userId = #{userId} and type = 1 ) as totalPay, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(money),0) from t_bills where userId = #{userId} and type = 2) as totalEarn, (SELECT DATEDIFF(NOW(),MIN(createDate)) from t_bills where userId = #{userId}) as totalDays
mapper.insert: insert into t_user_files( userId,filePath,remarks,createDate ) select #{userId},#{filePath},#{remarks},now() from dual where NOT EXISTS(SELECT id FROM t_user_files WHERE `filePath` = #{filePath})
